taxon_identification.name_authority_date: Setaria viridis (L.) P. Beauv. var. viridis

bio:treatment.description: Culms 20-100 cm; nodes 6-7. Blades 4-12 mm wide. Panicles usually 3-8 cm, producing around 600-800 caryopses. 2n = 18.
bio:treatment.discussion: Setaria viridis var. viridis is an aggressive adventive weed throughout temperate North America. It is the most common annual representative of Setaria in the Flora region.
